name: Crystal Defense
detailed_description:
Crystal defense is an action filled First Person Shooter - Tower Defense hybrid. Your actions play a critical role in a successful defense. Build and upgrade towers to help you defend.

Key features:
  • Wield a dual purpose weapon to spray or snipe your enemies
  • Build and upgrade towers
  • Get a helping hand by unlocking power-ups to your weapon
